```{r}
library(moderndive)
data("early_january_weather")
early_january_weather
```

Early January Weather Dataset:

This dataset consists of 15 variables, including origin, year, month, day, hour, temperature, dew point, humidity, wind direction, wind speed, wind gust, precipitation, visibility, and hour time.

The dataset consists of `r nrow(early_january_weather)` rows and `r ncol(early_january_weather)` columns.

The mean temperature is `r mean(early_january_weather$temp)`.

```{r, scatterplot}
library(tidyverse)
ggplot(
  early_january_weather, 
  aes(
    x = time_hour, 
    y = temp,
    color = humid
    )
  )+ geom_point()
ggsave("scatterplot.pdf")
```
